price: 25. Hase yeeshee kuwa (xaqa) rumeeyey oo samaha fala waxay leeyihiin abaalgud aan marnaba go’eynin (waa Jannada'e).
arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُمۡ أَجۡرٌ غَيۡرُ مَمۡنُونِۭ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: illā alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti lahum ajrun ghayru mamnūnin
